Text:
Oh yes, totally forgot to mention:

1. If you don't want the patch to spend five minutes searching all your hard drives for BioShock, put patch executable into BioShock folder.

2. If you are using cracked version, some files will have wrong checksums and therefore patch will skip them, reporting an error. This is normal, since you will overwrite them with cracked ones anyway.

This worked perfectly for me.  I had one file that the patch skipped, but the rest went through.  I got this patch because the safe in Arcadia wasn't working.  I loaded the patch, started the game back at a save point right before putting the rose in the pneumo, and everything went through perfectly. VITAL info for you guys.

Game needs to be extracted in root directory of drive.

Every single fucking patch there is in whole web wouldn't work for me, just freeze, cause I extracted Bioshock into torrent download folder.

Once I changed it from D:/bsch/game/2kgames/2kgames/BioShock to D:/2kgames/2kgames/BioShock it finally worked.

I'm posting this, since there's no info around the web and let's be honest you don't really expect that minor thing to matter.

Right, i got it to work, just copy everything from the crack folder that came with the patch into C:\Users\Owner\Downloads\Bioshock.PC.Game(djDEVASTATEâ˘)\2K Games\2K Games\BioShock\Builds\Release Replace when it asks you to and you should be fine.
Works great! Thanks!
